question: Hey I  have pcos I'm 22 year old I also have diabetes to but a few weeks ago I been feeling these tired a lot hungry a lot eating  stuff that I'm not suppose to eat due to my diabetes having headaches out the blue I thought you know maybe my sugar was high nope sugar s been good for the last 2 weeks now I been having cramping pains stomach hurts and getting bigger idk what's going on so I went to my doctor and told here the problems I was having she then decided to get my alc check and to get a blood test so I been waiting for my result .a few days later I took my self to the er  because I was still having these pains cannot lay on my stomach I feel bloated and my stomach just don't look right they took a ultrasound ,pregrancy test and a whole bunch of test and they all came back negative I took two tests and they came back negative  so they send me home saying that is abomial pains and that it will go away  so now I'm  still having like a sore abomial pains I'm still hungry and I having been taking any of my medicine that I need to take for my diabetes and my sugars are still fine  and I been eating all the wrong things I need help something is really wrong here
title: pcos confused
